item.title: Supporting multiple .NET SDK versions in analyzers and source generators
item.description: In this post I describe why source generators might need to work with multiple versions of the .NET SDK and how NuGet packages support this in .NET 6 Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/supporting-multiple-sdk-versions-in-analyzers-and-source-generators/
